description: The data provided here include hospital-specific charges for the more than 3,000 U.S. hospitals that receive Medicare Inpatient Prospective Payment System (IPPS) payments for the top 100 most frequently billed discharges, paid under Medicare based on a rate per discharge using the Medicare Severity Diagnosis Related Group (MS-DRG) for Fiscal Year (FY) 2011, 2012, and 2013. These DRGs represent more than 7 million discharges or 60 percent of total Medicare IPPS discharges.
keyword: Publically Available Data File - for download
title: Medicare Provider Utilization and Payment Data - Inpatient
